description:
Libération breaks new ground with its application for webOS!

Libération, one of France’s leading newspapers, offers you the Libération App for webOS and the HP TouchPad.

It's a two-sided application:

1. The latest-breaking local, national and international news in real-time from our offices in the 3rd arrondissement of Paris
2. A copy of the day’s newspaper in digital form

1. Late Breaking News
Free and unlimited access
> On the App landing page, view all the day’s latest news at a glance
> Other pages, including Politics, Society, World, Culture ... are just one ‘tap’ away to give you more in-depth stories and headlines
> The articles’ subtle format lends itself to a uniquely comfortable reading experience, and are enhanced by a prominent photo image
> Slideshows, Videos, Audio: Liberation’s extensive library of photos and multimedia content rounds out a rich and pleasurable reading experience

2. The Day’s Newspaper in Digital Format:
> The App’s second “face” allows you to browse through a digital version of the day’s Libération newspaper on your webOS tablet
> Access via paid subscription from only € 12 per month. To subscribe, simply go to http://promo.liberation.fr/abonnez-vous-a-liberation-sur-web-iphone-et-ipad/


Note: Libération is an application in French
